mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_name, password, e.emp_birth, e.email, e.cp_phone, e.mobile_phone, e.hiredate, e.leavedate, e.address, e.detail_addr, d.emp_dept_name AS 'dept_name', cc_position.common_code_name AS 'position_name', cc_grade.common_code_name AS 'grade_name', e.emp_dept_idx, e.emp_position_idx, e.emp_grade_idx FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx JOIN commons_code cc_position ON cc_position.common_code_idx = e.emp_position_idx JOIN commons_code cc_grade ON cc_grade.common_code_idx = e.emp_grade_idx WHERE e.emp_id = #{login_id};
